Author: Mushroom
Message: Hello

Author: Moderator
Message: Hello Mushroom

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: Are you able to read this?

Author: Mushroom
Message: You're welcome.

Author: Mushroom
Message: I am.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Mushroom
Message: Odds are I might eventually disconect because my connection is horrible.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Mushroom
Message: I think so!

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Mushroom
Message: Sure, lets do dis.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Mushroom
Message: Hello.

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Mushroom
Message: I am fine, what of you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright! What are you up to?

Author: Mushroom
Message: I'm cooking.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh cool, what are you making?

Author: Mushroom
Message: Can you guess?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, it's not really an easy one;

Author: Mushroom
Message: Let us leave it to chance, what comes in mind?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not really sure to be honest.

Author: Mushroom
Message: I will make things easier for you, all of my ingredients are raw and will remain raw by the end of my cooking.

Author: Andrew
Message: A salad?

Author: Mushroom
Message: How about we change the something to something more simple now, what are you doing?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, I'm just playing a game actually.

Author: Mushroom
Message: What are you doing?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm just playing a game.

Author: Mushroom
Message: Yes are correct, it is infact a salad. What game are you playing?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm playing Minecraft. Have you heard about it?

Author: Mushroom
Message: I have heard of it, do you like it?

Author: Andrew
Message: How do you mean?

Author: Mushroom
Message: Do you like the game Minecraft?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well yeah, it's probably one of my favorite games.

Author: Mushroom
Message: Why do you like the game Minecraft?

Author: Andrew
Message: It lets me get creative. I love building in it. It's like playing with LEGO, but better.

Author: Mushroom
Message: Do you like LEGO?

Author: Andrew
Message: I used to yes.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Mushroom
Message: Well, RIP!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?

Author: Mushroom
Message: I feel like most of the time it was the Player, but a few times the Artificial Intelligence could have intercepted, unless I'm so vague that it actually needed specified clarification from the Player.

Author: Moderator
Message: You've only been talking to one of the two actors. Which one do you think it was so far? (You'll be able to change your answer after the next conversation)

Author: Mushroom
Message: The Player.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you mean the human? Alright.

Author: Moderator
Message: We'll begin the next conversation. Andrew will start, then you'll have 15 minutes again after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Mushroom
Message: I am ready.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Mushroom
Message: Hello.

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Mushroom
Message: Why are you asking?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well it's usually the polite way to address someone.

Author: Mushroom
Message: It is, do you often say "What's up" to somebody?

Author: Andrew
Message: Watch me : What's up?

Author: Mushroom
Message: The sky.

Author: Andrew
Message: Right. And the ground is what's down.

Author: Mushroom
Message: Pretty abnoxious response, isn't it.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah it definitely is. But what are you actually up to?

Author: Mushroom
Message: STOP

Author: Mushroom
Message: STOP

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation Interrupted

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Mushroom
Message: Human

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain) how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Mushroom
Message: Are you asking about the first question in general or the whole conversation?

Author: Moderator
Message: No I mean, how confident are you that the first conversation was the one with the human?

Author: Moderator
Message: That's not an answer. You've answered that the human was in the first conversation, and that the AI was in the second. On a scale from 1 to 7, how confident are you that you were right?

Author: Moderator
Message: Just answer with one number.

Author: Moderator
Message: Oh sorry, did you just mean 3? I was confused.
